title: Integrated Education for Evidence-Based Medicine Clinical Application

context.prior_knowledge: Possession of basic medical knowledge and clinical practice experience
context.additional_context: Training for practicing medical professionals to strengthen competencies in applying Evidence-Based Medicine (EBM) principles to clinical scenarios. Scenario-based learning is enhanced via VR simulations in a BYOD environment

learning_goals: Apply the PICO framework to evaluate evidence levels with 80% accuracy during clinical case analysis
Successfully develop evidence-based treatment plans according to EBM principles in a VR simulation environment three times consecutively
Perform patient-tailored decision-making based on actual clinical data analysis with over 90% participation
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
